name: 林文印
objective:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
In this course we will discuss different aspects of environmental science. The main characteristics of environmental problems will be introduced. Since sustainable development has been the optimal goal of many countries, the details and questions of sustainable development are important to realize. Energy is one of the main issues of human being in the 21th century. When environmental planning and management are conducted, energy effect should be included. Green community is regarding the living quality of people’s daily life, to learn the core concept and steps of green community is also necessary.
schedule:
1 Introduction
2 Characteristics of Environmental Problems
3 Sustainable Development
4 Energy and Environment
5 Green Community
6 Oral Presentations
scorePolicy:
1. Class Participation 20%
2. Homework 40%
3. Term Paper & Presentation 40%
materials:
1. Resource and Environmental Management, Bruce Mitchell, Addison Wesley Longman, 1997
2. Environmental Planning and Management, Christian N. Madu, Imperial College Press, 2007
3. Environmental Economics and Management, S.J. Callan and J.M. Thomas, IRWIN, 1996

name: 曾昭衡
objective: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
schedule: 簡介作業研究Systems Analysis中的各式優選工具，並學習混沌理論。以生態族群的Growth and Decay模式為例，初窺混沌世界的奇妙，以提供往後解決問題時有不同的思考方向。混沌理論應用在物理、經濟、生物、數學的領域上，處理數百年來許多無法看透的問題有不錯進展(包括紊流現象)，在環境領域上的應用則尚待開拓。只要處理的系統(問題)具有自我相似性，以混沌來處理是可行的。(課程中將視時間教進階數學軟體Mathematica.)  Explore Chaos Theory from the Models of Growth and Decay (Simple Logistic Model, Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity, Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration).  Introduce important factors of Chaotic Behavior: Dynamics of species, Critical Reproduction Rate, Bifurcation, Butterfly effect.  Examples of Chaotic behavior: Single Species System, Two Species Competition System, Two Species Predator-Prey System. Mathematica Software (optional).
